txt.en: 'Your despair for your lost friends will be your end!'
'So many lost, so many you could have savedâ€¦'
'The fires of rage will burn you all!'
'All of these deaths could have been avoided. All that was required was submission!'
'Regrets, grief, despair. These are all my weapons!'
'I will turn your memories against you!'
'The Dark Lord may be gone, but his memory remains!'
'Recall the nightmare of the Dark Lord's terror!'
'Sorceries and secrets from all the ages are at my disposal!'
'I know of many ways to make you suffer!'
'So much misplaced hatred. The petty struggles of mortals.'
'Do you not understand? Hatred is but one tool in my arsenal!'
